about_the_game:
A Night Out: A Barroom Romance

Experience the Thrill of City Life and Love

Step into the vibrant atmosphere of a bustling city bar and experience the excitement of city life and love. This captivating DLC for Visual Girl invites you to explore the lively nightlife and connect with a diverse group of interesting and dynamic women.

About Bar Room:

  • Energetic Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with fun, laughter, and excitement, from lively cocktail parties to thrilling live music performances.

  • Shared Passions: Discover your love for music, art, and the city's vibrant culture, and share your passions with a group of talented and passionate women.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build strong emotional connections with your chosen partner.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring the city's nightlife to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • City life

  • Music and art

Don't miss your chance to experience the thrill of city life and love. Purchase the DLC today and start your own romantic adventure!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
